product_name: Look KeO Power Meter Pedal Kit
long_description: The impressive Look KeO Power kit offers pedal-based power measurement that can be easily swapped between bikes, plus a Polar CS600x computer and more so that you can unlock your riding potential.
short_description: The impressive Look KeO Power kit offers pedal-based power measurement that can be easily swapped between bikes, plus a Polar CS600x computer and more so that you can unlock your riding potential.
